name: Highway 183: Chapter 1
description: Highway 183 is a choose your own adventure story where you play a man in another world. You're high, a little drunk, and miles away from home, in a run-down town in the middle of nowhere. And, you've been asked to kill a man. Do you do it? Of course! Why not? What could go wrong? Aliens? Armies of snakes? Your own sheer idiocy? To find out, you just have to play!
